title: Acunetix
description: I use Acunetix to analyse websites for potential vulnerabilities so the website can either be attacked or inform the website owner with security solutions.

title: Burp Suite
description: I use Burp Suite to find vulnerabilities in websites by using their SQL injections, No-Redirect and SSRF tools.

title: Nmap
description: I use Nmap to analyse Website and Server details like Port statuses in order to inform owners about closing ports that can potentially be exploited.

title: Wireshark
description: I use Wireshark to analyse incoming network traffic and investigate handshake packets.

title: SQLMap
description: I use SQLMap to retrieve Database and Admin Panel information of SQL enabled website.
